name: vCita
tag_list: consulting, blogging, online-advice, vcita, itzik-levy, eran-utmazgin, consultants, bloggers, meetings, scheduling, payment
description: Turn your online presence into clients
overview:
vCita is a service that lets your online audience approach you, ask for advice or schedule a phone or video meeting â€“ transforming the way you interact with online visitors and manage potential clients online.

vCita can be used as a “set a meeting” widget on your website, a contact form on your blog or as a standalone contact page that you can link to from social networks or even your email signature.

vCita provides an end-to-end solution for communicating with potential clients, scheduling sessions, conducting online meetings or conference calls, and collecting payments for your services - All integrated into one end-to-end experience.

Who may find vCita useful? Consultants, personal and business coaches, technology experts, lawyers, financial and tax advisors, psychologists, professors, career advisors â€“ basically any professional who wish to be contacted online, provide advice or acquire new clients.

Example for vCita widgets - http://vcita.com/example Example for vCita standalone contact page - http://www.vcita.com/itzik.levy
